INSTRUCTIONS.name: READ ONLY: The name of the app, also url slug in 3vot.com/YOUR PROFILE/name
INSTRUCTIONS.description: The ~140 chars description that appears on your 3VOT Web Page with Apps
INSTRUCTIONS.displayName: The Name that appears on the 3VOT Platform Profile, it can have any character
INSTRUCTIONS.size: Apps have 3 sizes (small, regular and large); They have different traffic allowances and prices
INSTRUCTIONS.platforms: The file that will be dynamically loaded once we know the screen size. Located in the /start folder
INSTRUCTIONS.extensions: Compile Option: require files with using it's extension
INSTRUCTIONS.transforms: Compile Option: The NPM Browserify Transforms applied when compiling App
INSTRUCTIONS.external: Performance Option: Allows to extract the common depedencies between apps ie: jquery, cache and speed all apps
INSTRUCTIONS.gitDependencies: Bower and Github based Libraries that can be required within an app. ie: Angular
INSTRUCTIONS.depedencies: NPM Browser Compatible Dependencies that can be required within an app. ie: 3vot-model
